articles.author: Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Rupali Ganguly says she was treated like an outcast when she started doing TV to run home, pay father’s hospital bills - The Indian Express
articles.description: Rupali Ganguly said that she signed television roles without negotiating the money because she wanted to shift her father to a better hospital.
articles.content: Anupamaa actor Rupali Ganguly,who is the daughter of the famous filmmaker Anil Ganguly, has opened up about how people felt sorry for her and looked down upon her when she starred in television shows… [+1430 chars]

articles.title: “Shaitaan” is About To Follow You On Netflix - M9
articles.description: “Shaitaan” is About To Follow You On Netflix -The movie is a remake of the Gujarati film “Vash” which was released in 2023. The girl played the role of the possessed girl in Vash Janki Bodiwala, also played the same role in Shaitaan.
articles.content:
Shaitaan is about to possess you now on Netflix. The film is going to complete its successful two months in May 2024.
The story revolves around R Madhavan’s and Ajay Devgn’s character. Madhavan is a… [+810 chars]
